definitions.definition: AFK is an acronym that stands for 'Away from Keyboard.' It's used to indicate that a person is not present at their computer or is temporarily unable to respond.
definitions.term_usage_example: Sorry, I didn't respond to your messages earlier, I was AFK for lunch.

definitions.definition: AFK es un acrónimo que significa 'Away from Keyboard' (Lejos del teclado). Se usa para indicar que una persona no está presente en su computadora o está temporalmente indisponible para responder.
definitions.term_usage_example: Lo siento, no respondí a tus mensajes antes, estaba AFK almorzando.
